question: At times due to pressure of work my I miss salat. Sometimes Fajr salat is also missed. Shall I make up qadha with sunnat or shall I pray only Faraz.
answer:
QUESTION
Assalamu alilikum. 1.At times due to pressure of work my salat of Zohr and Asr misses. When shall I make up those salats. Can I do it after Maqrib salat on by on ?. 2. Some time Fajr salat misses. Shall I make up Khadha with sunnat or shall I pray only Faraz.
ANSWER


Share:
Respected Brother-in-Islam

Assalaamu Alaykum Wa Rahmatullaahi Wa Barakaatuhu

1. You should make every effort to perform every Salaat timeously. The
pressure of performing Salaat on time should not supercede the pressure of
work. However, if you did not perform Dhuhr and Asr Salaat timeously, you
may make Qadhaa of them after Maghrib Salaat.

2. If you make Qadhaa of Fajr Salaat before midday, you should also perform
the Sunnats of Fajr.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
